permissions: User must be authorized to create a production measurement for the specified job_production_plan_segment (delegated policy on the relationship).
side_effects: Creates a production measurement. When all calculation inputs are present, saving updates the related job_production_plan_segment quantity and quantity_per_hour.
validation_notes: job-production-plan-segment is required and must reference a job production plan segment; each segment can have only one production measurement. width-display-unit-of-measure is required and must be inches or feet. pass-count is required and must be greater than 0. width-inches, depth-inches, length-feet, speed-feet-per-minute, speed-feet-per-minute-possible, and density-lbs-per-cubic-foot must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --job-production-plan-segment
flags.validation: Required. Each segment can only have one production measurement.

flags.name: --width-inches
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --depth-inches
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --length-feet
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --speed-feet-per-minute
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --speed-feet-per-minute-possible
flags.description: Possible speed in feet per minute.
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.

flags.name: --density-lbs-per-cubic-foot
flags.description: Density in lbs per cubic foot.
flags.validation: Must be greater than 0 when provided.
